message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $13,500, which reflects its true worth.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $13,500 is really my starting point to be honest. Could you meet me halfway at $11,750?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I'm still looking to keep my spending within my budget. I am now willing to offer $9,500 for the product.
